SELECT r.id, r.registration_status, r.reservation_status FROM t_d_registration r JOIN t_d_offers o ON r.offer_id = o.offers_id AND r.job_id = o.job_id JOIN t_d_job_resume j ON o.job_id = j.job_id AND o.user_id = j.user_id
WHERE j.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT r.user_name, c.company_info_name, r.hire_date, r.position, j.job_area FROM t_d_registration r JOIN t_d_job j ON r.job_id = j.job_id JOIN t_d_company_info c ON j.company_id = c.company_info_id
WHERE r.id = #{id} AND c.company_info_status = 0 AND j.del_flag = 0 AND j.job_review = 1;
